property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play during your turn, an opponent loses [1] and you gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, distribute two +1 power counters among up to two of your characters. Diligent 1 Immediate: While this card is involved in a faceoff, you may remove a +1 power counter from this card to flip an additional card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play an Event, you may pay [2] to turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent starts a faceoff, you may pay [1] less for Events until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a Troublemaker is uncovered here, you may turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents must pay +[1] to play Troublemakers.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to move it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish this card from your hand to reduce the play requirements of your cards by 2 [Loyalty] until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may frighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a Problem faceoff involving this card by at least 5 power, you may retire this card to score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Mane Character is [Loyalty], this card has Competitive 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Pay [1] to give this card +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put three 1 [Loyalty] Pegasus Friend tokens with Swift into play.

property.value: When this card leaves play, you may frighten a Friend.

property.value: While your Mane Character is [Honesty], this card has Diligent 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card has at least 4 power, it has Calming 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish this card from your hand to reduce the play requirements of your cards by 2 [Honesty] until the end of the turn. When this card enters play, you may unfrighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this card would be frightened, you may banish a card from your discard pile instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Remove two +1 power counters from this card to put a 3 [Honesty] Rock Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this or another one of your Friends becomes unfrightened, you may put a +1 power counter on one of your Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card leaves play, you may put a +1 counter on a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Mane Character is [Laughter], this card has Eccentric 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish this card from your hand to reduce the play requirements of your cards by 2 [Laughter] until the end of the turn. When this card enters play, dismiss each opposing Friend here with printed power 1 or less.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card leaves play, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may dismiss a Friend here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your non-token Friends enters play here, you may exhaust any number of your Friends here and pay [1] for each Friend you exhaust this way to put that many 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend tokens into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card leaves play, you may put into play a number of 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend tokens equal to this card's power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may retire this card to give a character here +6 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to play this card, retire a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish a card from your hand and retire this card to gain control of an opposing Friend here until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, you may put a card from your hand on top of your deck, then flip an additional card. When you put a card on top of your deck, this card gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Mane Character is [Magic], this card has Meticulous 1.

property.value: When you play an Event, you may pay [1] to put a 2 [Magic] Figment Friend token into play.

property.value: Prepared Main Phase: Exhaust this card to gain [1].

property.value: When this card leaves play, you may move an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish this card from your hand to reduce the play requirements of your cards by 2 [Magic] until the end of the turn. Opposing Mane Characters here can't contribute their power to faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a Song card, give another character +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opposing Friend enters play here, you may put a 1 [Generosity] Unicorn Friend token with Prepared into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish this card from your hand to reduce the play requirements of your cards by 2 [Generosity] until the end of the turn. When you play this card, you may put a Friend with cost 2 or less from your discard pile into play.

property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, banish a Friend with 2 or less power. When this card enters play, banish an opposing Friend with 2 or less power until this card leaves play.

property.value: This card can't contribute its power to confronting Problems.

property.value: While there are no opposing characters here, this card has Showy 2.

property.value: When this card leaves play, you may pay [2] to put an opposing Friend into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a faceoff involving this card, you may pay [1] to have players flip 1 fewer cards during that faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play or becomes frightened, put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish this card from your hand to reduce the play requirements of your cards by 2 [Kindness] until the end of the turn. When this card enters play during your turn, each opponent loses [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Pay [1] to put an opposing Friend here with 1 power or less into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: While this card is flipped, an opposing character involved in the faceoff has -1 power for each of your characters involved in the faceoff. Immediate: While this card is involved in a faceoff, you may exhaust it to give each of your other characters involved in the faceoff +1 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a Friend would be frightened, you may pay [1] to dismiss it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put a 1 [Loyalty] Pegasus Friend token with Swift and a 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card is both a Lyra and a Bon Bon in all zones. When this card enters play, you may put a Friendship counter on another one of your Friends. When you move this card to a Problem, you may move one of your Friends with a Friendship counter to the same Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Retire a Friend to give this card +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Troublemaker Phase, you may turn over an opposing Troublemaker here. (This does not cover or uncover it.).

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a Problem faceoff involving this card by at least 5 power, you may put an opposing Friend into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: During faceoffs, this card has +1 power for each of your other characters here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [2] and retire this card to gain control of a Friend here with power less than or equal to this card's power.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play Friends and Resources from your discard pile as though they were in your hand. If a card would enter your discard pile from play, banish it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card's Problem can't be replaced until it is solved. When this card's Problem is solved, if this card would be sent home, it isn't sent home instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Diligent 2 Players' home limits are reduced by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a Friend here is dismissed, you may exhaust this card to gain [1].

property.value: When you play this card, banish another one of your Friends until this card leaves play. Immediate: Retire this card to draw a card.

property.value: Immediate: Retire this card to put a Troublemaker from your hand into play face-up at this card's Problem.

property.value: When one of your Critters enters play here, you may move an opposing character.

property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Your Friends get +1 power until the end of the turn, challenge an opposing Troublemaker with your characters at its Problem, or move one of your Friends to each Problem.

property.value: Main Phase: Put a token copy of one of your non-Unique Friends into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Turn an opposing Troublemaker face-down, uncover one of your face-down Troublemakers, or an opponent loses [1] and you gain [1].

property.value: Play to your home. When you put a card on top of your deck, you may exhaust this card. If you do, draw a card.

property.value: When you confront this Problem with at least 4 characters, gain [1].

property.value: When you put a +1 power counter on a character here for the first time each turn, you may put a +1 power counter on another character here.

property.value: Players can't score more than 3 points per turn.

property.value: When an opposing Troublemaker is uncovered here, draw 3 cards.

property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may put a Chorus counter on this card. Opponents need +1 power to confront this Problem for each Chorus counter on this card.

property.value: This card has +2 power for each other exhausted character at its Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of each opponent's turn, if no Problems were confronted this turn, you may score a point.
